description:
Begin ILLâ€™s adventure. Help MOM to recover and save your planet. Find out two endings of the story. Go through 50 different escape rooms. Use a rope, roll, jump, fly, dive, bounce, collect galaxies and energy. MOM needs more energy. Bring It to her.

What's waiting for you:
- an interesting adventure and arcade game scenario,
- 2 different endings,
- 50 levels,
- surprising extra escape rooms,
- great fun for hours,
- an ending that you agree with?!
name: BringIt to MOM
